pages.text: 70|40|Iya, ware wa azuma to nishi no omo ni yotte chikau. Ware ni totte wa kanodearu.
70|41|Kare-ra yori mo sugureta (soto no)-sha o motte, kare-ra ni kaete yarou. Ware wa, shippai suru koto wa nai nodearu.
70|42|Dakara anata wa, kare-ra o (kyoei ni) hitara se, tawamure ni makaseruga yoi. Kare-ra ga yakusoku sa rete iru, sonohi no kaiken made.
70|43|Kare-ra ga haka kara awatadashiku detekuru-bi. Sore wa marude (gense de) kare-ra ga guzo kami e to isoida yo ni.
70|44|Kare-ra wa me o fuse, kutsujoku o komurudearou. Kore ga kare-ra ni yakusoku sa rete ita, sonohidearu.
71|1|Hontoni ware wa, nufu o sono min ni tsukawashi,`itamashi chobatsu ga anata no min ni kudaru mae ni, anata wa, kare-ra ni keikoku shi nasai.'(To meijita).
71|2|Kare wa itta. `Watashi no hitobito yo, watashi wa anata gata e no komeina 1-ri no keikoku-shadesu.
71|3|Anata gata wa arra ni tsukae, kare o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.

71|4|Kare wa anata gata no samazamana tsumi o yurushi, sadame rareta kigen made, anata gata o yuyo nasa remasu. Hontoni arra no kigen ga kita toki wa, yuyo sa remasen. Moshi anata gata ga wakatte itanaraba.'
71|5|Kare (nufu) wa moshiageta. `Omo yo, watashi wa yoru mo hiru mo, watashi no hitobito ni yobikakemashita.
71|6|Daga, watashi no yobikake wa, tada (seido kara no) tohi o masu bakaridesu.

71|7|Watashi ga kare-ra ni,“kare ga, anata gata o o yurushi ni naru noda” to yobikakeru toki, kare-ra wa yubi o jibun no mimi ni sashikomi, jibun de gaito o komutte (fushinjin o) koshu shi, hitasura koman ni narimasu.
71|8|Sorede watashi wa,-goe o okiku shite kare-ra ni yobikakemashita.
71|9|Arutoki wa ko ni, mata (arutoki wa) hisoka ni kare-ra ni (uttaete),
71|10|watashi wa iimashita. “Anata gata no omo no o yurushi o negae. Hontoni kare wa, tabitabi o yurushi nasa reru.
